sentences.en: Bach's music is almost always at the pulse of a heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 巴赫的音乐几乎是与心脏跳动合拍的.

sentences.en: Each heartbeat has two basic parts: diastole and atrial and ventricular systole.
sentences.cn: 每一次心脏跳动都包含两个基本部分: 舒张期以及方式收缩期.

sentences.en: Experimenters have succeeded in controlling the rate and regularity of the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 实验者已经成功控制了心跳的速度和频率。

sentences.en: From the SA node, electrical impulses spread through the heart muscle to trigger the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 从窦房石结出来的电脉冲传播到心脏肌肉触发心脏跳动.

sentences.en: He was rigged up to a machine so that the nurses could check his heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 他身上连接了机器让护士检查心跳.

sentences.en: I was a little breathless and my heartbeat was bumpy and fast.
sentences.cn: 我有点儿喘不上气，心脏咚咚地快速跳动着。

sentences.en: laughter was only a heartbeat from tears.
Place your hand over your chest and feel your heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 把手放在胸口,感受心脏的跳动.

sentences.en: Quietly feeling your heartbeat, listen to your every aspiration.
sentences.cn: 静静的感受你的心跳, 倾听你每个心声.

sentences.en: She felt her heartbeat quicken as he approached.
sentences.cn: 随着他的走近，她觉得自己的心跳加速了。

sentences.en: She was taken to hospital suffering from an irregular heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 她因心律不齐被送往医院。

sentences.en: The combined contraction of the atria and ventricles is a heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 心房和心室的这一系列动作合称为一次心跳.

sentences.en: The idea is to maintain the regularity of the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 问题就是要维持心跳的规律性.

sentences.en: These crabs see you puckerin ', they gonna bitchify you in a heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 这些恶狼如果看见你畏畏缩缩, 他们肯定会好好修理你.

sentences.en: These things happen quickly on - screen, with the years elapsing in a heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 种种因果在银幕上飞快掠过, 而一年年的岁月以心跳的速度流逝着.

sentences.en: Your baby's heartbeat will be monitored continuously.
sentences.cn: 您小宝宝的心跳将会受到持续监听。
